quotes.alex: Best external I've ever used. The aimbot is so legit looking, admins spectated me for 30 mins and found nothing. 10/10.
quotes.night: Support is insane. Had an issue with my key and they fixed it in 2 minutes. The menu itself is smooth as butter.
quotes.fivegod: RedENGINE lookalike but feels even better optimized. FPS barely drops even with full ESP on. Starlix is the future.

installation.title: Installation Guide
installation.subtitle: Follow these steps to install and run Starlix Menu correctly.

1.title: Download the Loader
1.description: Go to your dashboard and download the latest version of the loader (`Starlix_Loader.exe`).
1.note: Make sure to disable Windows Defender or any other antivirus real-time protection, as they might flag the loader as a false positive due to obfuscation.

2.title: Run as Administrator
2.description: Right-click the loader file and select {bold}Run as Administrator{/bold}. This is required for the loader to inject into the game process properly.

3.title: Log In
3.description: Enter your Starlix account credentials (email and password) into the loader and click "Login".

4.title: Inject
4.description: Once logged in, ensure FiveM is running or waiting to be launched. Click "Load" on the cheat you want to use.

issues.title: Fix Common Issues
issues.subtitle: Solutions to the most frequent problems users encounter.

crashes.title: Loader crashes instantly
crashes.description: Ensure you have the latest Visual C++ Redistributables installed. Also, check if your antivirus is completely disabled.

hwid.title: "HWID Mismatch" Error
hwid.description: This means you are trying to use the cheat on a different computer than the one you originally used. You can request an HWID reset in the Dashboard.

menu.title: Menu not opening in-game
menu.description: Make sure your game is in "Borderless Windowed" mode. Fullscreen exclusive mode can sometimes block the overlay.
